meanings.definition: A creamy white condiment made from egg yolks, oil, vinegar, and seasonings.
meanings.sent1: I put mayo on my sandwich for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: She likes to make tuna salad with mayo.
meanings.sent3: The mayo spilled on the table, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth as mayo on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The mayo was so creamy, it melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: He asked for extra mayo on his burger.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a dollop of mayo.
meanings.sent3: The mayo jar was almost empty, so she bought more.
meanings.sent4: His love for music was like a jar of mayo, always present.
meanings.sent5: The mayo added a touch of richness to the salad.
